short_summary: The Department seeks to acquire Deployable Microgrids for the Embassy of Canada to Haiti.
description: deployment microgrids for continuous operation, promoting security and resilience at the Embassy of Canada to Haiti
full_summary:
=====================================

### Chancery and Official Residence Modular Solar Units

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Title:** Chancery and Official Residence Modular Solar Units
	+ English: [Chancery and Official Residence Modular Solar Units](#eng)
	+ French: [Chancellerie et Résidence Officielle Unités Solaires Modulaires](#fr)
* **Reference Number:** cb-890-31156657
* **Amendment Number:** 12
* **Solicitation Number:** 24-253889
* **Publication Date:** 2024-02-21
* **Tender Closing Date:** [2024-06-03T14:00:00](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32458/24-253889---qa03-en.pdf)
* **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

#### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** CNST (Canadian National trade Secretariat)
* **Type of Tender:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Method of Procurement:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price (Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix)

#### Supply Requirements

* The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada is seeking proposals for the supply and installation of Deployable Microgrids (Modular Solar Units + battery energy storage system (BESS) + controller) to maintain the operational continuity, security, and resiliency of the Embassy of Canada to Haiti.

#### Trade Agreement

* The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC))

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Monde (World)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Haïti (Haiti)

#### Contractor Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0G2 Canada
* **Contact Name:** Meagan Leclair
* **Contact Email:** realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (343) 598-9721

#### Attachments

Please find the relevant tender documents and amendments below. More information can be obtained on the
